TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ThemeDictionaryExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: Implements a markup extension that enables application authors to customize control styles based on the current system theme.

span.span: Implements a markup extension that enables application authors to customize control styles based on the current system theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa classe é uma implementação de extensão de marcação.This class is a markup extension implementation. Classes de extensão de marcação existem principalmente para fornecer suporte à infraestrutura de algum aspecto do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] implementação do processador e os membros expostos por uma extensão de marcação não são normalmente chamados do código do usuário.Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. Essa extensão dá suporte a [extensão de marcação ThemeDictionary](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md) uso da [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].This extension supports the [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Uso de texto XAMLXAML Text Usage Para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informações, consulte [extensão de marcação ThemeDictionary](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md).For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método aceita [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] implementação do processador e não se destina a ser chamado diretamente.This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] implementação do processador usa esse método para manipulação adequada de `ThemeResourceDictionary` valores de extensão durante a criação do objeto.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `ThemeResourceDictionary` extension values during object creation. Essa implementação depende de serviços com base no passado `serviceProvider`.This implementation relies on services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. Ele não deve ser `null`.It must not be `null`. O `serviceProvider` objeto deve implementar .The `serviceProvider` object is expected to implement .
